text: "What About Your Friends" is a song by TLC. It is the third single from their debut album, Ooooooohhh... On the TLC Tip. It reached #7 on the Billboard Hot 100. This made it the group's third consecutive top-ten single. ==Charts== ===Weekly charts=== Chart (1992â€“1993) Peak position Australia (ARIA) 79 Europe (European Dance Radio) 20 Netherlands (Dutch Top 40 Tipparade) 8 UK Dance (Music Week) 33 ===Year-end charts=== Chart (1992) Position US Billboard Hot 100 88 US Hot R&B;/Hip-Hop Songs (Billboard) 67 Chart (1993) Position US Billboard Hot 100 62 US Hot R&B;/Hip- Hop Songs (Billboard) 72 ==Certifications== ==Release history== Region Date Format(s) Label(s) United States August 21, 1992 LaFace United Kingdom October 12, 1992 Japan November 21, 1992 Mini-CD ==References== Category:1992 songs Category:TLC (group) songs Category:Hip hop songs Category:New jack swing songs Category:R&B; songs
title: What About Your Friends
